NOTES: 
Well first off a big thank you to cassanova for the audio top stuff m8 ;-) 
Right .....the video is the russian TS which was really good for such an early release,picture was sharp with nice colours,the only really downside was the subs were in russian and there's alot ......really need english subs for this film. 

The audio,well been speaking the cass for alot over these last 2 weeks and he said he could supply me with direct audio.....and this was the first,and 
it's a really nice source and direct......thank you. 
Riptides.......subs were great,real piece of work...... 

WORK DONE: 
Well lucky i kept the audio cut/splits :lol: .........saves me having to re-sync again. Well i used all the original sources again and tweaked the video differently this time....looks better to me. So that left just the subs to do......well all the hard was already done,however i had to change most of the times has there were slightly out....some worse than others,but 
at least i didn't have to type them all in :P 


Ps PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD MY RELEASES IF YOU DON'T LIKE RE-ENCODES OR IF YOU THINK BY SOME HOW ME RE-ENCODING THEM IS GOING TO MAKE THEM LOOK LIKE R5'S....BECAUSE THEY DON'T!!!!! 

Anyway enjoy the movie,it's free!!!! 


PLEASE CHECK SAMPLE....BECAUSE SCREENSHOTS ALWAYS LOOK BETTER!!!!!

This movie is a mix of english and some foreign languages, so it needs the english subs, and this has alot more than kingbens version.
